content: * until last chain space is completed then place 1 double_crochet in each st until the end of the row chain 2 and turn row 8 1 double_crochet in each st until the chain space * in the chain space 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each stitch until the next chain space repeat from * until end of row ending with 1 double_crochet in each st until the end of the row chain 2 and turn repeat row 3 thru 8 until desired size is achieved to begin the border chain 1 and turn your work place 1 single_crochet in each st until the chain space * in chain space 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in ea st until chain space repeat from * until end of the row chain 2 and swivel your work so you ll be working along the uneven edges that are the front edges and neck of the shawl place 2 half_double_crochet around each chain or st until the center be sure not to place a stitch in the small opening that is the head of the st from previous rounds see image 1 for stitch placement at the chain space in the center place 2 half_double_crochet around the chain 4 from the beginning then continue placing 2 half_double_crochet around each chain or st until the end where you will place a half_double_crochet into the head of the 1st single_crochet from the corner chain 1 and turn your work place 1 single_crochet in each st until the end placing the last st into the chain space tie off image 1 video tutorial available on youtube @juantheyarnaddict please like/share/subscribe this pattern is property of juan the yarn addict owner of jtya designs llc all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of juan the yarn addict you may use this pattern for personal non- commercial use only sales of the finished product are permitted with credit given to juan the yarn addict no part of this document may be reproduced altered distributed or otherwise shared in any form or by any other means
